lite.name: Lite
lite.description: Essential workflow agents with core document and debugging skills optimized for mobile development
lite.useCase: Users wanting comprehensive Android workflow management with essential document processing and debugging capabilities
lite.targetUsers: Beginners, evaluators, mobile developers wanting balanced features

standard.name: Standard
standard.description: Complete workflow and development team with enhanced testing and validation skills for Android development
standard.useCase: Professional mobile development with full team coordination, testing, and comprehensive skill set
standard.targetUsers: Professional Android developers, mobile development teams, quality-focused users

pro.name: Pro
pro.description: Complete installation with all capabilities optimized for advanced mobile development and testing
pro.useCase: Full-featured installation for users needing all AI codegen, document processing, mobile testing, and Android-specific capabilities
pro.targetUsers: Power users, enterprises, mobile teams requiring comprehensive Android development support
